cellpadding=\\\"0\\\" cellspacing=\\\"0\\\" width=\\\"100%\\\"\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003ctr\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003ctd class=\\\"ContentText\\\" align=\\\"left\\\"\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003eEmirates Motor Company (EMC), General Distributors of Mercedes-Benz in the Emirate of Abu Dhabi and the flagship company of Al Fahim Group, launched the all-new Mercedes-Benz 2015 C-Class in a gala iftar and a superb unveiling of the fabulous new innovative car on Saturday, 5 July at their close-to-heart Airport Road Showroom in Abu Dhabi.\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003eIn the presence of newly appointed CEO Automotive of Al Fahim Group, Mr. Frank Bernthaler, the celebrative evening continued with a press conference where EMC hosts Mr. Kamal Rafih, General Manager, Mr. Jordan Duckett, General Sales Manager, and Mr. Rabih Eid, Operations Manager, were head-table spokespersons.\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003e\\\"We are delighted to be revealing the admirable all-new Mercedes-Benz 2015 C-Class during a blessed, festive month and announce the great achievements we\\u0027ve accomplished so far this year,\\\" praised Mr. Rafih in his speech to the media. \\\"As we conclude the first half of the year, we also celebrate a well-earned increase in our sales performance of 42% compared to the same period last year,\\\" he added.\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003eAmong the most popular models in 2014 which witnessed an exponential rise were the legendary Mercedes-Benz S-Class by an impressive 347%, the sporty A-Class by 156%, the luxurious E-Class by 46%, and the entire sports utility vehicle (SUV) range by 22%, which includes the G-Class, GL-Class, GLK Class and the M-Class.\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003eDuring the memorable occasion, media representatives and guests were also invited to explore the latest innovation by Mercedes-Benz and register for the driving experience. The all-new C-Class sets new standards in the premium medium-size category in terms of striking appearance, cutting-edge technology, spacious comfort and refined sportiness. A host of new assistance systems offers safety of the highest standard, while a new optional air-sprung suspension provides for exemplary ride and driving comfort as well as nimble and agile handling.\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003eThanks to intelligent and innovative lightweight construction, the aluminum hybrid body is around 70 kilograms lighter than a conventional steel body. Compared with the successful predecessor, the aluminum content has increased from less than 10% to almost 50%. As a result, the vehicle\\u0027s overall weight is reduced by up to 100 kilograms. Furthermore, with an 80-millimeter increase in the wheelbase compared with the previous model, the vehicle is 95 millimeters longer and 40 millimeters wider. The result is a more spacious interior.\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003eHigh-class interior with fine details\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/strong\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003e\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nThe innovative touchpad developed by Mercedes-Benz in the hand-rest marks a further evolutionary step. As on a smartphone, this provides for simple and intuitive operation of all the head-unit functions using finger gestures. The touchpad also permits letters, numbers and special characters to be entered in handwriting - in any language supported by Audio 20. One of the main highlights of the innovative touchpad is that Arabic letters, numbers and even special characters are supported, and can be entered into the handwriting recognition function.\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003eMercedes-Benz Intelligent Drive: the intelligent car\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/strong\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003e\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nThe new C-Class incorporates almost all of the new assistance systems with a host of enhanced functions which celebrated their world premiere in the S-Class and E-Class only some months ago. The assistance systems enhance both comfort and safety. Mercedes-Benz calls this Intelligent Drive.\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003eThe new C-Class offers numerous innovative safety and assistance systems. It is equipped as standard with ATTENTION ASSIST, which can warn the driver of inattentiveness and fatigue. In addition to Adaptive Brake Assist, which offers protection from collisions from speeds as low as 7 km/h, standard-fit COLLISION PREVENTION ASSIST PLUS also features an additional function: when the risk of collision persists and the driver fails to respond, the system is able to carry out autonomous braking at speeds of up to 200 km/h, thereby reducing the severity of collisions with slower or stopping vehicles. The system also brakes in response to stationary vehicles at a speed of up to 50 km/h, and is able to prevent rear-end collisions at up to 40 km/h.\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003eOther safety features include:\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/strong\\u003e \\u003cspan\\u003e\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n-DISTRONIC PLUS with Steering Assist and integrated Stop&Go Pilot\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n-BAS PLUS Brake Assist and PRE-SAFE® Brake\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n-Enhanced Active Lane Keeping Assist\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n-Active Parking Assist\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n-Traffic Sign Assist\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n-Adaptive Highbeam Assist Plus\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/td\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/tr\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/table\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/div\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/td\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/tr\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/td\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/tr\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003ctr\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003ctd\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003cimg alt=\\\"\\\" src=\\\"http://94.56.199.34/EMC/EMCPortal/DesktopModules/Farabi.ICatalog/CatalogImages/488/NATIONAL_AMBULANCE-7047.jpg\\\" style=\\\"width: 100%; float: right\\\" hspace=\\\"0\\\" /\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/td\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/tr\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003ctr\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003ctd\\u003e \\r\\n \\u003cdiv class=\\\"Content\\\" valign=\\\"top\\\"\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003ctable border=\\\"0\\\" cellpadding=\\\"0\\\" cellspacing=\\\"0\\\" width=\\\"100%\\\"\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003ctr\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003ctd class=\\\"ContentText\\\" align=\\\"left\\\"\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003cp\\u003eEmirates Motor Company (EMC) is proud to have supplied almost 40 Mercedes-Benz Sprinter vans converted into ambulances to the National Ambulance Company as well as a Mercedes-Benz E200 Estate car adapted to become the country’s first Rapid Response Vehicle (RRV). \\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e“We are proud to have collaborated with the National Ambulance Company to build an innovative and expedient product which we have no doubt will prove to be a valuable addition to the emergency response system employed in the capital,” commented Mr. Kamal Rafih, General Manager of EMC. “This alliance further emphasizes the country’s successful endeavors of utilizing the latest advancements in technology to ensure the fastest and best care is provided to victims of an emergency.”\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003eThe National Ambulance Company is the leading national provider of emergency pre-hospital care in the United Arab Emirates. Mr. Robert Ball, Chief Executive Officer (CEO) of National Ambulance, stated, “We went through a global search for vehicles and ambulance converters; the Mercedes-Benz Sprinter was the best choice for the unique environment here in the UAE. EMC has a long history of vehicle support and maintenance which is essential when operating any vehicle fleet.”\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003eImmediately following manufacture, the Sprinter vans were transported directly from the Mercedes-Benz factory in Germany to Wilker Group in the UK to be modified into ambulances. The E200 Estate, however, was converted into an RRV in EMC’s service center in Mussafah, Abu Dhabi by a team from Wilker. Wilker Group has more than 50 years of experience in the design, build and delivery of world class ambulance and specialist vehicle conversions. \\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e“Both the Wilker Group and EMC have been able to demonstrate a commitment to supporting our \\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\npre-hospital care services; we have been very happy with the way they have contributed to National Ambulance,” continued Mr. Ball. \\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003eMr. Simon Teevan, newly appointed General Commercial Vehicles Manager at EMC, added, “The Mercedes-Benz E 200 Estate RRV carries up to three paramedic personnel, including the driver and the equipment required by first-responders to the scene of an incident. It is not an ambulance in the strictest sense of the word as it isn’t intended to carry patients. Instead, the vehicle was customized for Abu Dhabi Airport Company’s airside operations as a first responder until an ambulance arrives.\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e“As for the 40 Sprinters which were recently delivered to the National Ambulance Company, they are state-of-art ambulance vehicles equipped with the most advanced medical equipment,” continued Mr. Teevan. “Mercedes-Benz is the perfect brand for such uses as it is one of the safest and most reliable premium vehicles in the world.”\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%; font-family: calibri, sans-serif;\\\"\\u003eThe partnership between the National Ambulance Company and EMC highlights both corporations’ goals to provide the absolute best for patients and clients, respectively. Following its parent company’s – Al Fahim Group – footsteps, EMC’s mission is to deliver exceptional services and innovative solutions striving to exceed all stakeholders’ expectations. Thus, this praiseworthy tie-up perfectly fits the mission, vision and values of both corporations. \\u003c/span\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/td\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/tr\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/table\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/div\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/td\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/tr\\u003e\\r\\n increase of 11% compared to 2012 and Number One Status in customer satisfaction scores in the GCC region for the third consecutive year.\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e \\u003cspan\\u003e\\\"2013 will go down in the history of EMC as a year of overachieving many challenging milestones, such as winning the Sheikh Khalifa Excellence Award (SKEA) Gold Category, reaching new sales records in passenger cars and commercial vehicles, as well as opening the new Express Service Centre at our showroom on Airport Road,\\\" commented Mr. Kamal Rafih, General Manager of EMC. \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003eMaintaining its status as the highest volume of sales across the Mercedes-Benz range in EMC was the incredibly popular Mercedes-Benz 2014 E-Class, while the luxurious, newly launched S-Class 2014 witnessed a 15% jump in the same period. Moreover, examining the sporty segment, the Gull-wing SLS soared to double-digit figure sales recording a 160% increase compared to the year before.\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e \\u003cspan\\u003e\\\"In particular, the SUV range of Mercedes-Benz has been gaining more admiration in the capital year-on-year,\\\" he added. In terms of highest increase from 2012 to 2013, the Mercedes-Benz GLK topped the list with a remarkable 373% rise. Following suit, the rest of the sports utility vehicle (SUV) range observed an increase in sales performance with the GL-Class reaching 114%, the M-Class at 25% and the G-Class at 9%.\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003eOn another note, Mr. Rafih emphasized, \\\"Our presence and endorsements of community activities related to our line of business is key in nurturing a personal connection with our customers.\\\" Just recently EMC hosted a Drag Race for the Group 63 Club giving them an opportunity to race against each other in a well-managed and safe environment. \\\"Moreover, we are regular official car sponsors for the famous Abu Dhabi Film Festival (ADFF) and Abu Dhabi Media Summit as we aim to encourage talents from the fine arts industry to bloom.\\\"\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003eEMC\\u0027s care for public safety on the road is one of the Mercedes-Benz distributor\\u0027s chief concerns. As a socially responsible organization, EMC constantly seeks different ways to tie-up with various governmental organizations such as the Abu Dhabi Traffic Department to generate more awareness on this serious subject. \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003eHaving said that, Mr. Rafih concluded, \\\"These positive trends in the market demonstrate customers\\u0027 satisfaction with EMC\\u0027s commitment to service excellence and our keenness to continue improving at all levels of the business. Our customers have unique demands and it is our duty to ensure their requirements are met with innovative solutions to exceed their expectations for a strong and enduring relationship. All these accomplishments have provided us with a robust foundation for a promising and prosperous year ahead in 2014.\\\"\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/td\\u003e\\r\\n align=\\\"left\\\"\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003cp\\u003eIn collaboration with Khadamati, an integrated asset management company, the Vehicles and Drivers Licensing Department at Abu Dhabi Police is offering its services at the Emirates Motor Company (EMC) showroom on the Airport Road where a new office was recently opened in order to offer all licensing services to customers more easily.\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003eColonel Suhail Al Khaili, Chief of the Vehicles Licensing Section at the Abu Dhabi Police Vehicles and Drivers Licensing Department, said that the new office will cater to the needs of the company’s customers, employees and its affiliates. The wide range of services provided by the new office include: the issuing and renewal of expired driving licenses, replacement of lost driving licenses, and the registration, issuance and renewal of vehicle registration cards. “Such a step saves time and effort as it doesn’t require people to go to the department building or any other branch in Abu Dhabi to get their transaction done,” said Al Khaili.\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003eColonel Al Khaili emphasized that the new office provides high quality services and rapid and accurate completion of all transactions for customers. He mentioned that the department intends to open similar offices in the future to keep up with drivers’ growing demand for registration services in Abu Dhabi. It is also in pursuance of the government’s vision to provide citizens and residents with accessible services wherever they are. Al Khaili invited other companies to take the initiative and to suggest the opening of new licensing offices so that they can benefit from the easy access to all services.\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003eMr. Kamal Rafih, Emirates Motor Company General Manager stated that the opening of Abu Dhabi Police’s new licensing office at the company helps improve the quality of services and saves customer’s time and effort by providing them with registration services at the company’s showroom on the Airport Road. “We extend our thanks and appreciation to the Abu Dhabi Police for their initiative to have the office here. This shall enhance the partnership between them and all other sectors that provide various easy and high quality services to individuals,” he said. \\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003eMajor Saif Al Zaabi, Vehicles Licensing Branch Manager at the Abu Dhabi Police Vehicles and Drivers Licensing Department, and a number of Emirates Motor Company (EMC) employees attended the meeting.\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/td\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/tr\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/table\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/div\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/td\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/tr\\u003e\\r\\n style=\\\"font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, sans-serif;\\\"\\u003eUnder the patronage of His Excellency (HE) Sheikh Nahyan Bin Mubarak Al Nahyan, Minister of Culture, Youth & Community Development and President of the Abu Dhabi Future Center for Special Needs, ABILITIESme was the first exhibition and conference of its kind in the UAE which focused on economic, social, education and professional empowerment of people with disabilities, and Emirates Motor Company (EMC) was one of the main sponsors of the event. \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, sans-serif;\\\"\\u003eThe event took place from 24 to 26 March 2014 and was designed to raise awareness of on ways to help people with disabilities achieve important goals in school, university, work, sports, and society. Held at the Abu Dhabi National Exhibition Center (ADNEC), the exhibition featured local and international corporations communicating the latest information on rehabilities, special needs education, social inclusion and assistive technology. \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, sans-serif;\\\"\\u003eDuring the event, HE Sheikh Nahyan stated, “We in the United Arab Emirates recognize that everyone is endowed with a unique set of gifts and that each person has the capacity to make an important contribution to society. We\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, sans-serif;\\\"\\u003e are confident that we can and should help all people, whatever their individual needs, in developing their special abilities so that they will realize their full potential and lead fulfilling lives.”\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, sans-serif;\\\"\\u003eMr. Kamal Rafih, General Manager of EMC, also added, “We are proud to play an active role as the National Automotive Sponsor in this heartfelt initiative by AbilitiesME. EMC has and always will be a keen supporter of activities which inspire special needs students to rise to their potentials and become significant members in the economic, social and academic sectors of the UAE. AbilitiesME and EMC share a common cause to make a difference in society and endorse individuals who wish to develop their skills.”\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, sans-serif;\\\"\\u003eFurthermore, Mr. Simon Teevan, General Commercial Vehicles Manager at EMC, was one of the keynote speakers who discussed how simple it was to customize a Mercedes-Benz vehicle to accommodate individuals with special needs as drivers and passengers. During his speech, Mr. Teevan also mentioned EMC’s partnership with the Department of Transport in 2013 where a number of customized Mercedes-Benz van taxis were launched to cater to individuals with disabilities in Abu Dhabi. \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/td\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/tr\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/table\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/div\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/td\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003e28 September 2014, Abu Dhabi:- \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/strong\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003eIn an exclusive gala dinner at the Fairmont Bab Al Bahr Hotel, Emirates Motor Company (EMC), Mercedes-Benz authorized distributors in the Emirate of Abu Dhabi and the flagship company of Al Fahim Group, unveiled the “Ultimate in Aesthetic Sportiness,” the new 2015 S-Class Coupe from Mercedes-Benz.\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003eInaugurating the special evening were Al Fahim Group’s Board Members, His Excellency Mohammed Abdul Jalil Al Fahim and His Excellency Abdullah Abdul Jalil Al Fahim, where Mr. Frank Bernthaler, CEO of Al Fahim Automotive welcomed guests, the media and partners. Meanwhile, representing EMC were General Sales Manager Jordan Duckett and Operations Manager Rabih Eid. \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003eDuring his opening speech, Mr. Bernthaler praised, “We have witnessed a masterpiece come to life marking a revolutionary change to a new world of modern luxury, elegance and aesthetic sportiness. This exclusive launch of the breathtaking all-new S-Class Coupe corroborates Mercedes-Benz’s beacon of luxury, EMC’s unlimited commitment to service excellence and the family’s vision to provide best-in-class services and solutions characterized by innovation and excellence,”\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003eHe also emphasized, “Most cars begin as concepts whose ideals rarely reach the final product—until now. The all-new 2015 S-Class Coupe is virtually unchanged from the concept version—a breathtaking new expression of our flagship. As exclusive as it gets - the ultimate in aesthetic sportiness the breathtaking design of the S-Class Coupe marked by sporty-classic proportions and sensual purity.”\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003eThe high-end coupe\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/strong\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003eStylistically self-assured presence, exclusive appointments and refined sportiness, the new S-Class Coupe from Mercedes=Benz combines the classic proportions of a large, sporty coupe with modern luxury and pioneering technology. As a world premiere, the breathtaking two-door coupe can be optionally equipped with the Magic Body Control suspension system. Additional technical highlights are the head-up display and the touchpad feature. Optionally available expressive LED High Performance headlamps, each featuring 47 Swarovski crystals, produce a uniquely striking appearance. \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003eThe two-door is initially available with a 4663 cc V8 biturbo engine that delivers a rated output of 455 horsepower (hp). The sporty motoring experience is significantly enhanced by the emotional sound produced by the exhaust system. \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003eExtremely low wind noise was declared objective when developing the S-Class Coupe with the aeroacoustics experts implementing form optimization measures as early as the design phase. Achieving success, the S-Class Coupe is the world’s quietest series-production car in terms of wind noise. \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003eThe exterior: flowing profile of perfect proportions\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/strong\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003eThe S-Class Coupe is characterized by typical rear-wheel drive proportions, emphasized by the hallmark Mercedes dropping line. The long bonnet with pronounced lines and powerdomes, the low greenhouse with high beltline, the accentuated wheel arches as well as the large wheels and the broad visual effect created by the rear reinforce the S-Class Coupe’s exceptional automotive refinement. \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003eIt’s convex and concave modeled surfaces lend the S-Class Coupe a sensuous character, its classic elegance forming a perfect symbiosis with the modern-progressive design idiom. \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003eThe full-LED headlamps with their iconic eyebrows as daytime running lamps lend it an extremely self-assured and distinctive gaze. In combination with the standard LED Intelligent Light System, unique headlamps with no less than 47 Swarovski crystals are available. \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003eThe interior: modern luxury as avant-garde design\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/strong\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003eThe interior design of the new S-Class Coupe is an enthralling combination of sculptural, sensuous volume elements and components, and the clear geometry of its basic architecture. High-class appeal, quality workmanship and exceptional touch and feel are a treat for the passengers’ senses, so that the car’s interior represents the highest level of “modern luxury”.\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003eIn front of the armrest, is the touchpad with its black high-sheen surface and chrome-look surround. As on a smartphone, the touchpad allows all the head-unit functions to be operated using finger gestures. \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003eBoth the front and the rear seats have a pronounced sporty character, the two rear seats are designed as individual seats. The Exclusive package optionally includes seats in design Exclusive nappa leather with a striking diamond back-stitching pattern on backrests and seating surfaces. \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003eLower transversal forces: active curve tilting\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/strong\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003eAvailable in the S 65 AMG, the Magic Body Control first suspension system with the ability to “look ahead”, had its world premiere in the S-Class. With the curve tilting function, the Coupe introduces a further world first for series-production cars. The curve tilting function makes the Coupe lean into bends in a manner similar to a motorcyclist or skier. The lateral acceleration acting upon occupants is reduced in a way akin to when driving in a steep curve, and passengers sit more firmly. \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003eOn country roads in particular, the new curve tilting function enhances motoring enjoyment and comfort. The aim is not to achieve higher cornering speeds, but a new driving experience: the S-Class Coupe glides elegantly through bends. \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003eEmotively sporty sound: exhaust system with flaps\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/strong\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003eThe emotive sound of the exhaust system makes a decisive contribution to the sporty driving experience. The deeper sound components ensure a fuller, sportier sound. In the transversally positioned rear silencer of the twin-pipe exhaust system, there are two flaps that can be opened and closed pneumatically depending on the engine speed. As soon as the S-Class Coupe engine starts, the power of its sound can be heard. \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003eLike the S-Class Saloon, the new Coupe is available with numerous new assistance systems that make driving even more comfortable and safer. \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003eStarting price is at AED 565,000.\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n justify;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003eAbu Dhabi:-\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/strong\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003eEmirates Motor Company (EMC), authorized Mercedes-Benz distributor in the Emirate of Abu Dhabi, hosted the ultimate drag race competition for one of the most well-known car clubs in the United Arab Emirates (UAE) – Group 63 AMG Club – at Yas Marina Drag Racing Center. \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"text-align: justify;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003eNow reaching 1016 members, Group 63 is a club –founded by Khaled Al Mulla, Ahmed Al Qasimi, and Sultan Al Rahuomi – which has brought together Emiratis, Yemenis, Qataris, Iraqis, Bahrainis, Kuwaitis and Saudi Arabians with Mercedes-Benz AMG cars starting with the 63 series and up. The club includes extremely unique and the most exclusive vehicles in the region, such as Mercedes-Benz AMG 63, 65, Black Series, Brabus and other breathtaking editions. \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"text-align: justify;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003eMoreover, Group 63’s Mercedes-Benz owners are drag racing kings, and EMC is delighted to host such a spectacular event for them at one of the world’s most advanced circuits. EMC’s support of this adrenaline-pumping activity is to demonstrate the company’s loyalty toward their customers and its efforts to enable Mercedes-Benz owners to experience the remarkable features of their distinctive and high performance engines. \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"text-align: justify;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003eA hundred and thirty-three (133) eminent Mercedes-Benz AMG 63 model owners gathered at the Yas Drag Racing Center to watch and compete against one another for the EMC & Group 63 First Place title. Sprinting and revving on the drag racing road strip in expensively modified Mercedes-Benz C, E, M, G, CLS and SLS 63s with a minimum horsepower of 580 and reaching 1000, was a magnificent sight for Mercedes-Benz enthusiasts!\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"text-align: justify;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003eTaking the First Place trophy home was Mr. Ahmad Bin Khadya from Digi-Tec driving the Mercedes-Benz C Brabus Bullet finishing the ¼ mile sprint in 10.5 seconds. Runner-up of the drag race was Mr. Salah Al Moodi from PP-Performance with his Mercedes-Benz CL 63, and following him reaching Third Place was Mr. Sultan Al Rumaithi from PP-Performance driving the Mercedes-Benz CLS 63.\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"text-align: justify;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003eCongratulations to the racers who competed and especially to the First, Second and Third Place winners! \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/td\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/tr\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/table\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/div\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/td\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/tr\\u003e\\r\\n src=\\\"http://94.56.199.34/EMC/EMCPortal/DesktopModules/Farabi.ICatalog/CatalogImages/488/EMC and NAS teams pose for group photo (1280x851).jpg\\\" style=\\\"width: 100%; float: right\\\" \\u003ctable border=\\\"0\\\" cellpadding=\\\"0\\\" cellspacing=\\\"0\\\" width=\\\"100%\\\"\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003ctr\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003ctd class=\\\"ContentText\\\" align=\\\"left\\\"\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003cp style=\\\"text-align: justify; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-family: calibri, sans-serif;\\\"\\u003eAbu Dhabi, 11 December 2013 \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/strong\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-family: calibri, sans-serif;\\\"\\u003e– Emirates Motor Company (EMC), Mercedes-Benz authorized distributors in the Emirate of Abu Dhabi and the flagship company of Al Fahim Group, has collaborated with National Aviation Services (NAS), an internationally recognized aviation services provider, to use Mercedes-Benz GL Classes as shuttle services at Abu Dhabi International Airport’s new VIP Terminal, set to open in December 2013. \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"text-align: justify; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-family: calibri, sans-serif;\\\"\\u003eThe formal signing ceremony between Mr. Hassan El-Houry, NAS Chief Executive Officer and Mr Kamal Rafih, EMC General Manager was also attended by Mr. Mohammed Al Bulooki, Abu Dhabi Airports Chief Commercial Officer. NAS is Abu Dhabi Airports’ partner in operating and managing the VIP Terminal, along with a few other passenger services at the Abu Dhabi International Airport.\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"text-align: justify; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-family: calibri, sans-serif;\\\"\\u003eSeparate from Terminals 1 and 3, the VIP Terminal will still be located within the Abu Dhabi International Airport and will be providing services to VIP travelers through NAS, which also provides Golden Class services in Abu Dhabi International Airport’s Terminals 1 and 3. Amongst other facilities for guests using the VIP Terminal, one of the key features of the service is the tarmac transfer to the aircraft, using EMC’s Mercedes-Benz vehicles. \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"text-align: justify; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-family: calibri, sans-serif;\\\"\\u003eAt the occasion, Mr. Rafih commented, “EMC is pleased to partner with NAS and Abu Dhabi Airports to complement their new world-class VIP Terminal with luxurious transportation services to further add refined style and elegance to their important passengers.”\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"text-align: justify; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-family: calibri, sans-serif;\\\"\\u003eMr. El-Houry confirmed, “Partnering with EMC is a step in proving that the guests of the VIP Terminal will enjoy luxury and convenience at its best. The VIP Terminal is not only an epitome of privacy and luxury within Abu Dhabi International Airport, but is also a lifestyle choice for many individuals in the region. Hence, EMC and Mercedes-Benz were an ideal choice of partners as we believe their brands are as strong as our vision for our VIP travelers.”\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"text-align: justify; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-family: calibri, sans-serif;\\\"\\u003e Besides having a distinct immigration, police and baggage handling service and a separate entrance road to the VIP Terminal, VIP guests will enjoy private transfer to and from the aircraft directly in latest models of Mercedes-Benz cars. Furthermore, there will be a dedicated EMC Mercedes-Benz Majlis within the VIP terminal with entertainment for guests who are Mercedes-Benz enthusiasts. \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"text-align: justify; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-family: calibri, sans-serif;\\\"\\u003eWith similar visions to its partners Abu Dhabi Airports and NAS, EMC is also committed to providing best-in-class products and services, and these certainly include servicing VIP visitors to the capital and passengers returning home. It is important to EMC for VIP terminal guests whom are also Mercedes-Benz owners from Abu Dhabi or anywhere around the world to feel they have a familiar territory to resort to when they first arrive to the country. \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/td\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/tr\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/table\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/div\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/td\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/tr\\u003e\\r\\n align=\\\"left\\\"\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003cp\\u003eEmirates Motor Company (EMC) has been awarded the Sheikh Khalifa Excellence Award (SKEA) Gold Category in a dazzling ceremony on 24 September 2013 at Emirates Palace Hotel Abu Dhabi under the patronage of His Highness (HH) General Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Al Nahyan, Crown Prince of Abu Dhabi, Deputy Supreme Commander of the UAE Armed Forces, and in the presence of HH Sheikh Hamed Bin Zayed Al Nahyan, Chief of Abu Dhabi Crown Prince’s Court. \\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e \\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003eChairman of the Higher Committee of SKEA and Chairman of Al Fahim Group, His Excellency (HE) Saeed Abdul Jalil Al Fahim, delivered an inspiring keynote at the ceremony stating, “\\u003cspan style=\\\"letter-spacing: 0.6pt;\\\"\\u003eIt is of my great honor to address you today in our annual celebration for quality and corporate excellence as we complete our program this year: Sheikh Khalifa Excellence Award: Twelve years of Sustainable Excellence.\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"letter-spacing: 0.6pt;\\\"\\u003e“Without the unlimited support and encouragement of the wise leadership for this important national project, the accomplishments of the award program, which exceeded the borders of the country towards the world, would not have been achieved, especially that the award program has become a local and regional representative to the most important international organizations for quality and excellence such as the European Foundation for Quality management (EFQM) and the British Royal Institute, to name a few.”\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"letter-spacing: 0.6pt;\\\"\\u003eMr. Al Fahim also mentioned that the program is not an award companies try to receive, but it is an integrated program with a core value to develop the Emirate of Abu Dhabi and the UAE by creating distinguished assessors and nationals in their skills, knowledge and behavior; thereby, creating distinguished public and private establishments in their efficiency, affectivity and capability.\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e \\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e \\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e \\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e \\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e“First and foremost, I would like to congratulate each and every employee in EMC and within shared services; this award recognizes the progress we have made in establishing EMC as the leading distributor in the UAE. It is an outstanding achievement, with the project of submission, being led by EMC’s GM, Kamal, who did an excellent job of pulling the report together and ensuring we met all nine criteria of the EFQM excellence model. Through spirited teamwork and pioneering determination, we put our minds to work and every year took one step closer to the excellence this award recognizes,” commented Mr. Christopher Preston, CEO of Al Fahim Group Automotive. \\u003cspan dir=\\\"RTL\\\" style=\\\"font-family: arial, sans-serif;\\\"\\u003e \\u003c/span\\u003e “Today we celebrate this collaborative effort by receiving this distinguished and internationally recognized award; thank you and we look forward to new accomplishments proving we have unlimited commitment to service excellence.”\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e \\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"letter-spacing: 0.6pt;\\\"\\u003eFurthermore, receiving the award on behalf of Emirates Motor Company, Mr. Kamal Rafih, General Manager of EMC, praised, “I take this opportunity to thank Al Fahim Group’s SKEA team of EMC and the shared service department managers who worked hard in preparing for the submission with EMC. It is a great recognition for us as a company which embraces the excellence model in its operations and procedures whereby seeking further improvements on all fronts.”\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%; font-family: calibri, sans-serif; letter-spacing: 0.6pt;\\\"\\u003eIn his closing remarks, Mr. Rafih commented, “\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%; font-family: calibri, sans-serif;\\\"\\u003eI am proud to dedicate this award to our employees, and, \\u003cspan style=\\\"letter-spacing: 0.6pt;\\\"\\u003eon their behalf \\u003c/span\\u003eto EMC’s customers and the Chairman of Al Fahim Group, Mr. Saeed Abdul Jalil Al Fahim and the Al Fahim family. This special moment became a reality through their guidance, love, care, and support.”\\u003c/span\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/td\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/tr\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/table\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/div\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/td\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/tr\\u003e\\r\\n align=\\\"left\\\"\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 10pt; line-height: 115%; font-family: verdana, sans-serif;\\\"\\u003eEmirates Motor Company (EMC), Mercedes-Benz authorized distributor in the Emirate of Abu Dhabi and the flagship company of Al Fahim Group, has signed a sponsorship agreement with twofour54 as the Principal Partner for the 7\\u003csup\\u003eth\\u003c/sup\\u003e Annual Abu Dhabi Film Festival (ADFF) and the Abu Dhabi Media Summit (ADMS), which are due to launch in October 2013. \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e \\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 10pt; line-height: 115%; font-family: verdana, sans-serif;\\\"\\u003eAdditionally, EMC will be sponsoring the Black Pearl Rising Star Award, which will be presented to young actors who have demonstrated outstanding performances.\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e \\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 10pt; line-height: 115%; font-family: verdana, sans-serif;\\\"\\u003eDuring the event, Ms. Noura Al Kaabi, Chief Executive Officer of twofour54, praised the strategic partnership and support extended by EMC highlighting that the successes witnessed from such activities in Abu Dhabi wouldn’t have been achieved without the unified national efforts and partnership between the private and public sectors.\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e \\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 10pt; line-height: 115%; font-family: verdana, sans-serif;\\\"\\u003eOn behalf of EMC, Mr. Kamal Rafih, General Manager of EMC, expressed the organization’s commitment toward both events which have become major regional occasions, and stated: \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 10pt; line-height: 115%; font-family: verdana, sans-serif;\\\"\\u003e“EMC continues to contribute to Abu Dhabi’s film and media sectors through the endorsement of ADMS and ADFF as part of our corporate social responsibility and to encourage talents in both sectors, particularly among UAE nationals. Moreover, our collaboration with twofour54 has undergone successful progression of the Abu Dhabi Film Festival and Abu Dhabi Media Summit which are from the most leading specialized festivals on both the international and regional levels.”\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e \\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 10pt; line-height: 115%; font-family: verdana, sans-serif;\\\"\\u003eWorth mentioning, celebrities, media managing executives and press representatives participating in the summit and festival will be transported in Mercedes-Benz 2014 models throughout the entire event. Meanwhile, visitors to the activities at Emirates Palace Hotel will have the advantage of exploring the ultimate in luxury, the newly launched, all-new and magnificent Mercedes-Benz 2014 S-Class.\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e \\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 10pt; line-height: 115%; font-family: verdana, sans-serif;\\\"\\u003eThe Abu Dhabi Media Summit will take place from 22 to 24 October 2013. This is followed by the Abu Dhabi Film Festival which will commence on the evening of the 24 October and will continue through to 2 November.\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n center;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"text-decoration: underline; font-size: 10pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003eEmirates Motor Company launches the prestigious, all-new Mercedes-Benz S-Class in Abu Dhabi \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/strong\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"text-align: center;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cem\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 10pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003eAnnounces overall sales increase of 7% in first half and 89% among the SUV range compared to 2012\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/em\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 10pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003eAbu Dhabi, 20 July 2013:-\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/strong\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 10pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003e The pinnacle of the Mercedes-Benz promise to deliver the Best or Nothing in luxury automotive development, the prestigious, all-new Mercedes-Benz S-Class 2014, has arrived to Emirates Motor Company’s (EMC) showrooms, the authorized Mercedes-Benz distributor in the Emirate of Abu Dhabi, which has also announced an increase of 7% in sales for the first half of 2013 compared to the same period last year. \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 10pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003eAttending the press conference at EMC Airport Road Showroom were Mr. Mike Belk, President & CEO of Daimler Middle East & Levant, and Mr. Kamal Rafih, General Manager of EMC.\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 10pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003e“With the exciting launch of the long-awaited all-new Mercedes-Benz S-Class 2014, our loyal customers and Mercedes-Benz admirers are eager to explore this dazzling invention. This is evident in the long list of orders we have been receiving from our valuable customers since last year,” commented Mr. Rafih. “Hundreds of bookings have been requested and we are striving to deliver to our dear customers their lavish, dream cars between now and the end of the year – depending on availability.\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 10pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003e“Having said that, we will start delivering the exquisite new S500s from tonight followed by the S63 and S400 which will reach our showrooms by October of this year,” he continued. \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 10pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003eAdditionally, Mr. Rafih addressed the outstanding sales performances of the other Mercedes-Benz models with the top three models, the popular E-Class, C-Class and M-Class, representing about 70% of EMC sales in 2013. “Our sales of the SUV range have also greatly risen by a healthy 89% in the first half of 2013 compared to the same period in 2012. Specifically, the highest increases in sales this year are the G-Class (96%), GL (87%) and the compact GLK at an impressive 725%.\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 10pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003eThe ten-day launch ceremony, taking place in EMC’s showroom on Airport Road, attracted many true Mercedes-Benz admirers and featured an elaborate, creative presentation of the all-new S-Class. Covered in lush black curtains, the all-new S-Class 2014 is the center of attention inside the secluded, deluxe room. Visitors will have the chance to explore the all-new S-Class with the assistance of EMC’s dedicated S-Class team. \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 10pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003eThe aspiration: the best automobile in the world\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/strong\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 10pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003eWith the three engineering priorities “Intelligent Drive”, “Efficient Technology” and “Essence of Luxury”, the all-new S-Class extends the boundaries of technology on many levels. To underline the superiority of the all-new S-Class, and its ambition to lead, there are many new elements which have never been developed in any car before the S-Class 2014 model. \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 10pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003eThe new, sophisticated S-Class is the first vehicle in the world whose headlamps, tail lights and interior lighting are fully LED-based. Furthermore, it is the world’s first car to be able to detect bumps on the road ahead through the Road Surface Scan feature. The Magic Body Control instantaneously sets up the suspension to deal with the new situation. Another world first is the “active perfuming system” as part of the new Air Balance feature. The perfume atomization system individualizes the smell of the vehicle interior discreetly and mildly. \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003e\\u003cspan \\u003cli\\u003eThe PRE-SAFE® Brake can also detect pedestrians and initiate autonomous braking to avoid a collision at speeds up to 50 km/h.\\u003c/li\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003cli\\u003ePRE-SAFE® PLUS can recognise an imminent rear-end collision and warn the following traffic by activating the rear hazard warning lights at a high frequency. \\u003c/li\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003cli\\u003eWith PRE-SAFE® Impulse, the driver and front passenger are pulled away from the direction of impact by their seat belts at an early phase of the crash.\\u003c/li\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003cli\\u003eDISTRONIC PLUS with Steering Assist and Stop & Go Pilot takes the burden off the driver when it comes to lane guidance and is also able to follow vehicles in traffic jams automatically.\\u003c/li\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003cli\\u003eFor the first time, thanks to the stereo camera the Brake Assist system BAS PLUS with Cross-Traffic Assist is able to detect crossing traffic and pedestrians too, and to boost the braking power applied by the driver accordingly. \\u003c/li\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003cli\\u003eIf the lane markings are broken lines, Active Lane Keeping Assist can detect when the adjacent lane is occupied, and reduce the risk of the vehicle leaving its lane unintentionally by applying the brakes on one side.\\u003c/li\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003cli\\u003eNight View Assist Plus was further improved and supplemented by a thermal imaging camera. \\u003c/li\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003c/ul\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/td\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/tr\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/table\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/div\\u003e\\r\\n cellpadding=\\\"0\\\" cellspacing=\\\"0\\\" width=\\\"100%\\\"\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003ctr\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003ctd class=\\\"ContentText\\\" align=\\\"left\\\"\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003cp style=\\\"margin: 0cm 1.1pt 0.0001pt 0cm; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%; font-family: calibri, sans-serif;\\\"\\u003eAbu Dhabi, 9 April 2013: The first ever appearance of the long-awaited Mercedes-Benz A-Class in Abu Dhabi by Emirates Motor Company (EMC), Mercedes-Benz authorized distributors in Abu Dhabi and flagship company of Al Fahim Group, was at the Abu Dhabi International Sports Exhibition (ADIS) which took place from 9 to 12 April 2013 at the Abu Dhabi National Exhibition Center (ADNEC).\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/strong\\u003e \\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"margin: 0cm 1.1pt 0.0001pt 0cm; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%; font-family: calibri, sans-serif;\\\"\\u003e \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"margin: 0cm 1.1pt 0.0001pt 0cm; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%; font-family: calibri, sans-serif;\\\"\\u003eOrganized by the Jiu-Jitsu Federation, ADIS brought sports fans all under one roof revealing to them various sports-related activities and equipment. The major sports event coincides with the globally recognized World Professional Jiu-Jitsu Championship 2013.\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"margin: 0cm 1.1pt 0.0001pt 0cm; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%; font-family: calibri, sans-serif;\\\"\\u003e \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%; font-family: calibri, sans-serif;\\\"\\u003e“This highly regarded sports event of the year was the ideal venue for Emirates Motor Company to reveal – for the first time in the emirate – the sporty and luxuriously designed hatchback Mercedes-Benz A-Class. This mighty powerful compact captivated the eyes and hearts of Mercedes-Benz fans in Abu Dhabi with its AMG body-styled design, powerful 4-cylinder engine reaching 0 to 100km in just 6.6 seconds,” praised Mr. Kamal Rafih, General Manager of EMC. \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%; font-family: calibri, sans-serif;\\\"\\u003eBesides its strikingly appealing design, the 2013 Mercedes-Benz A 250 is a 2-litre turbocharged engine which produces a roaring 211 hp and 350Nm torque. At the same time, the standard GCC specifications of the model include the radar-based COLLISION PREVENTION ASSIST system, Distronic Plus, Blind Spot Assist, among other technologically enhanced safety measures. In addition, the new A-Class also follows other standard options in other Mercedes-Benz vehicles such as Xenon Lights, Active Parking Assist and a Light Sight Package (Interior Ambient Lighting).\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%; font-family: calibri, sans-serif;\\\"\\u003e \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%; font-family: calibri, sans-serif;\\\"\\u003eSpeaking of the interior, the fully loaded hatchback comes with a sporty interior design with red stitching, red seatbelts, red-framed SLS AMG-style air vents and comfortable sport seats. The A-Class holds the unequivocal Mercedes-Benz exterior with an aggressive diamond grille, red brake calipers, 18” five-spoke AMG light-alloy wheels in high sheen black finish and headlamps with red marker rings. \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%; font-family: calibri, sans-serif;\\\"\\u003e \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%; font-family: calibri, sans-serif;\\\"\\u003eIn his closing remarks, Mr. Rafih stated, “The arrival of the A 250 Sport to Abu Dhabi will mark a new direction for Mercedes-Benz in the emirate as we will be officially competing with the best in class in the luxury small car segment. We are targeting ambitious, affluent and young prospects providing them with a high performance, safe, practical and prestigious car at a price that makes attainability of the brand a reality to a growing youth market.”\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/td\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/tr\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/table\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/div\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/td\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/tr\\u003e\\r\\n Mercedes-Benz Econic Truck powered with Natural Gas fuel from ADNOC Distribution\\r\\n \\u003c/h1\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/td\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/tr\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003ctr src=\\\"http://94.56.199.34/EMC/EMCPortal/DesktopModules/Farabi.ICatalog/CatalogImages/488/Mercedes-Benz Econic Natural Gas Truck for Lavajet at ADNOC Distribution NGV.JPG\\\" style=\\\"width: 100%; float: right\\\" hspace=\\\"0\\\" /\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/td\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/tr\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003ctr\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003ctd\\u003e \\r\\n \\u003cdiv class=\\\"Content\\\" valign=\\\"top\\\"\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003ctable border=\\\"0\\\" cellpadding=\\\"0\\\" cellspacing=\\\"0\\\" width=\\\"100%\\\"\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003ctr\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003ctd class=\\\"ContentText\\\" align=\\\"left\\\"\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003cp style=\\\"text-align: justify;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003e- Beating Europe’s 2014 Euro 5 Emission Standard already today -\\u003cspan style=\\\"text-decoration: underline;\\\"\\u003e\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"text-align: justify;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 14pt; line-height: 115%; font-family: garamond, serif;\\\"\\u003eAbu Dhabi: In line with Abu Dhabi’s strategy to go green, the Commercial Vehicles Division of Emirates Motor Company (EMC), Mercedes-Benz authorized distributors in Abu Dhabi and Al Ain and flagship company of Al Fahim Group, delivered the first Mercedes-Benz Econic truck powered by Compressed Natural Gas (CNG) to waste collection company contracted by the Center of Waste Management – Abu Dhabi (Lavajet), an international provider of environmental waste management services.\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"text-align: justify;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 14pt; line-height: 115%; font-family: garamond, serif;\\\"\\u003eThe Mercedes-Benz Econic CNG is certified in accordance to the Enhanced Environmentally friendly Vehicles (EEV) emission standards. It offers operators significant savings on fuel costs and also has drastically reduced emissions which already today allow to not only reach but even fall below the very strict Euro 5 emission standard effective in the European Union beginning 2014. Over and above, the Mercedes-Benz Econic features 50% lower noise pollution, whilst simultaneously offering the high transport capacity of a truck, the maneuverability of a van and ergonomics of a low-floor vehicle.\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"text-align: justify;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 14pt; line-height: 115%; font-family: garamond, serif;\\\"\\u003eThe Centre of Waste Management – Abu Dhabi stated: “CWM is eager to endorse this environmentally responsible initiative, which will further assist us in applying sustainable and integrated waste management systems that conform to global standards and complement Abu Dhabi’s Vision 2030. Now is the time for natural gas vehicles. We will continue to support Abu Dhabi’s ambitious lead on fuel efficiency and drastically reduce emissions, aiming to inspire and encourage the ongoing development of such eco-friendly initiatives.”\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"text-align: justify;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 14pt; line-height: 115%; font-family: garamond, serif;\\\"\\u003e“We are delighted that EMC has given us the opportunity to try the Mercedes-Benz Econic CNG on our operations in Abu Dhabi. The attributes of the vehicle offer us many advantages as we are heavy users of our fleet,” praised Eng. Alberto Germani, LAVAJET Abu Dhabi project manager. ”We will benefit from the low running costs and at the same time we will be more environmentally friendly while carrying out our business,’ he added. \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"vertical-align: top; text-align: justify;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 14pt; font-family: garamond, serif;\\\"\\u003eFor his part, Mr. Abdullah Al Dhaheri, General Manager ADNOC Distribution, commented “We are delighted that Emirates Motor Company has taken up this initiative together with LavaJet and the Abu Dhabi Center for Waste Management and used ADNOC Distribution NGV fuel for the first CNG truck in the UAE. This initiative will promote the use of NGV fuel for a cleaner environment\\u003c/span\\u003e \\u003cspan dir=\\\"RTL\\\" style=\\\"font-size: 14pt; font-family: arial, sans-serif;\\\"\\u003e \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 14pt; font-family: garamond, serif;\\\"\\u003ein line with Abu Dhabi Vision 2030. ADNOC Distribution plays an important role in marketing and distributing NGV in Abu Dhabi. The company has converted several numbers of taxis and vehicles of different Government entities reaching a total number of 2675 vehicles at the end of 2012 and also provided them with NGV fuel from many of ADNOC service stations.\\u003c/span\\u003e \\u003cspan dir=\\\"RTL\\\" style=\\\"font-size: 14pt; font-family: arial, sans-serif;\\\"\\u003e \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 14pt; font-family: garamond, serif;\\\"\\u003eIn the same time we encourage all companies and customers to use NGV fuel.”\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"text-align: justify;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 14pt; line-height: 115%; font-family: garamond, serif;\\\"\\u003e \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"text-align: justify;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 14pt; line-height: 115%; font-family: garamond, serif;\\\"\\u003eMr. Daniel Fitzjohn, general commercial vehicle manager stated, “We are proud to be contributing to Abu Dhabi’s cleaner future by promoting environmentally responsible transport solutions that use alternative fuels in order to reduce our impact on the environment. Lavajet is a good partner for us and hopefully this trial in their fleet will encourage other operators to join in with the country’s green initiatives to reduce our carbon footprint.”\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 14pt; line-height: 115%; font-family: garamond, serif;\\\"\\u003eIn line with the dealership’s core values of Substance and Foresight, Emirates Motor Company is committed to being the best in class in all that it does for and in the community. By introducing the Mercedes-Benz Econic CNG in Abu Dhabi, Emirates Motor Company and Lavajet are supporting the government’s efforts into building an environmentally aware society which measures its impact on the natural environment and works towards finding solutions to avoid harming the ecosystem.\\u003c/span\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/td\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/tr\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/table\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/div\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/td\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/tr\\u003e\\r\\n center;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 14pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003eEmirates Motor Company launches the Android and iPad versions of its iPhone Application\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/strong\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"text-align: center;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cem\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 14pt; line-height: 115%;\\\"\\u003eNumber of users increased by 433% since new versions launched\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/em\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"text-align: justify;\\\"\\u003eAbu Dhabi:- Emirates Motor Company (EMC), Mercedes-Benz general distributor in Abu Dhabi and Al Ain and the flagship company of Al Fahim Group, has launched an Android and iPad version of the EMC iPhone application adding value to Mercedes-Benz clients in Abu Dhabi and providing them with a fast channel of communication with the dealership at their fingertips.\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"text-align: justify;\\\"\\u003e“At EMC, we aim to constantly keep excelling in the level of service we offer to our clients. All in all, the Android, iPad and updated EMC iPhone application are certainly set to be personal EMC service advisors, directories, customer service executives, and road-side assistants in the pocket of each of our privileged EMC clients and Mercedes-Benz owners,” commented Mr. Kamal Rafih, General Manager of EMC.\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"text-align: justify;\\\"\\u003eEver since its launch in the market, there has been a spike in the number of users downloading the application of over 433% compared to when the first version was introduced. The Android and updated version of the EMC iPhone application feature a new video gallery and an improved photo gallery with the option to share Mercedes-Benz images with friends and contacts. To further emphasize the dealership’s 50\\u003csup\\u003eth\\u003c/sup\\u003e anniversary celebrations, a dedicated section of the photo gallery includes old images of Abu Dhabi and the company. \\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"text-align: justify;\\\"\\u003eFor more practical purposes, customers interested in receiving a cost estimate for vehicle parts can click on the new ‘Parts Inquiry’ button and receive a relevant quote via the application. The ‘watch-list alert’ option is utilized for users who are awaiting a certain vehicle to come into stock. Once the vehicle the user is seeking is available in the showroom, an alert appears to notify him/her immediately. \\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"text-align: justify;\\\"\\u003eBy far, one of the most useful features of both the Android and iPhone/iPad applications, are the virtual tours of all EMC showrooms and the integration of GPS which allows users to walk through EMC’s showrooms, view cars and their specifications as if s/he was actually in the showroom. Every EMC outlet has its GPS coordinates stored in the application to provide precise locations, directions and facilitate road-side assistance with the click-of-a-button. The built-in GPS option can also be utilized by EMC’s benefits program cardholders for the convenience of browsing the list of approximately thirty partners, accessing all the new promotions available, and simply detecting store locations via Google Maps.\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"text-align: justify;\\\"\\u003eIn line with Emirates Motor Company’s strategies which focus on innovation, customer satisfaction and product leadership, the dealership has also launched a social media webpage on Facebook, Twitter and YouTube bridging the gap between the organization and its loyal customer base. Mercedes-Benz enthusiasts and owners in Abu Dhabi may now communicate with EMC via various channels.\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"text-align: justify;\\\"\\u003eTo download the application search for “EMC Mercedes-Benz” application.\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/td\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/tr\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/table\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/div\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/td\\u003e\\r\\n center;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 14pt; line-height: 115%; font-family: cambria, serif;\\\"\\u003eGala Dinner Held to Commemorate EMC’s 50\\u003csup\\u003eth\\u003c/sup\\u003e Anniversary\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/strong\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"text-align: center;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 14pt; line-height: 115%; font-family: cambria, serif;\\\"\\u003e \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/strong\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"text-align: center;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cem\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 14pt; line-height: 115%; font-family: cambria, serif;\\\"\\u003eIn the presence of HE Sheikh Nahyan Mubarak Al Nahyan, Mercedes AMG Petronas Formula One Team and UAE celebrity Ask Ali\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/em\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"text-align: center;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cem\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 14pt; line-height: 115%; font-family: cambria, serif;\\\"\\u003e \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/em\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"text-align: justify;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 12pt;\\\"\\u003eAbu Dhabi, 1\\u003csup\\u003est\\u003c/sup\\u003e November, 2012:\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/strong\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 12pt;\\\"\\u003e Under the patronage and presence of His Excellency Sheikh Nahyan Bin Mubarak Al Nahyan, Minister of Higher Education and Scientific Research, and in the presence of Mercedes AMG Petronas Formula One (F1) Team, Emirates Motor Company (EMC) commemorated its 50\\u003csup\\u003eth\\u003c/sup\\u003e anniversary in a gala dinner at Fairmont Bab Al Bahr Hotel where Al Fahim Group’s Board of Directors attended, Honorary Chairman HE Mohammed Abdul Jalil Al Fahim, Chairman HE Saeed Abdul Jalil Al Fahim, Managing Director Mr. Rashed Abdul Jalil Al Fahim, and Mr. Mike Belk, President & CEO of Daimler Middle East & Levant (DMEL). \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"text-align: justify;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 12pt;\\\"\\u003e“I extend my warmest welcome and gratitude to H.E. Sheikh Nahyan Bin Mubarak Al Nahyan whose patronage goes beyond boundaries. We are honoured that Sheikh Nahyan has graced us with his presence to this special occasion for Al Fahim family and Emirates Motor Company. The past 50 years have seen EMC go from one achievement to the next and we welcome the next 50 years with anticipation and determination to remain pioneers in the UAE,” praised Mr. Al Fahim. \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"text-align: justify;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 12pt;\\\"\\u003eEMC has been an icon in the motoring industry in the UAE and has witnessed the exponential growth of the Emirate in its rich half-century of history. As the flagship company of the Al Fahim Group, EMC symbolises the phenomenal advancement of its parent company. From humble beginnings in 1962, EMC has progressed with Abu Dhabi to become the leading automotive company in the premium sector of the market. \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"text-align: justify;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 12pt;\\\"\\u003eThe lush gardens of the Fairmont Bab Al Bahr served a perfect venue for the hundreds of distinguished guests in attendance. A classical string trio set an ambient tone to the evening that was complemented with a unique action-painting presentation by Jennifer Stelco.\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"text-align: justify;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 12pt;\\\"\\u003eThe original work of art was completed in just minutes and accompanied by an electric violin to a captivated audience. The unique painting of serves as a memorable emblem of the rich partnership Emirates Motor Company shares with Mercedes-Benz, Al Fahim family and various stakeholders in the country since the dealership’s early beginnings in the early 1960s. \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cspan style=\\\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%; font-family: calibri, sans-serif;\\\"\\u003eCultural guide and Emirati role model ‘Ask Ali’ moderated the exclusive event, delivering a speech in honour of the anniversary for the eminent guests present\\u003ca \\u003cdiv\\u003e\\r\\nAbu Dhabi, 19th June 2012 - Emirates Motor Company, Mercedes-Benz Authorized Distributor in Abu Dhabi and Al Ain and the flagship company of Al Fahim Group, celebrates its 50th anniversary with emphasis on innovation, superb service, and social responsibility. \\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nThe landmark event was marked by the spirit of two business generations from Al Fahim family, which reflects the continuous endeavor of Al Fahim Group to positively contribute to the economic prosperity of Abu Dhabi.\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nH.E. Mohammad Abdul Jalil Al Fahim, the Honorary Chairman of Al Fahim Group said, \\\"This jubilee evokes the nostalgia of sharing the dreams of the late Sheikh Zayed Bin Sultan Al Nehyan, and his wise vision for a better future, matched with the strong belief of our late father, Abdul Jalil Al Fahim, who was a real contributor to the economic prosperity in Al Ain and Abu Dhabi.\\\"\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nHe added, \\\"The jubilee celebrations reflect our commitment to our community, our roots in the UAE and our gratitude to our customers.\\\" \\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nMeanwhile, H.E. Saeed Abdul Jalil Al Fahim, the Chairman of Al Fahim Group said, \\\"As we celebrate this golden milestone, EMC and the mother group will remain faithful to this country, contributing to its national economy, prosperity, and success, in line with Abu Dhabi Economic Vision 2030, under the wise leadership of His Highness Sheikh Khalifa bin Zayed Al Nahyan, President of the UAE.\\\" \\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nMr. Rashed Abdul Jalil Al Fahim, Managing Director of Al Fahim Group stressed that \\\"The jubilee celebrations will be packed with innovative initiatives and creative events, including campaigns and public competitions, to ensure that the whole community is feeling the joy and pride we have of keeping our Mercedes-Benz star in Abu Dhabi for the past 50 years.\\\" \\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nAl Fahim Group\\u0027s Managing Director also revealed that EMC has increased its service and sales performance positively this year and that the company is in continuous quest for new services and packages to be launched, to meet their loyal customers\\u0027 needs. \\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nMr. Rashed added, \\\"EMC takes customer service very seriously, and we spare no efforts to use new technology for customers\\u0027 peace of mind. We have launched EMC iPhone applications where the customers can interact with us and be informed of all updates related to their car service. \\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\\"We have launched a customer relationship program called \\\"Voice of the Customer\\\" where professionals follow up with customers to get their feedback and look for ways to improve the rendered services.\\\" \\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nFurther emphasizing EMC\\u0027s continuous development, the dealership reported a sales increase to date with the Mercedes-Benz CLS shining a real star with 639% increase compared to the same period last year. Additionally, a 38% increase in the sales was witnessed on the GL Class, followed by a 35% rise in C Class sales. \\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nMr. Rashed emphasized the value-added benefits that EMC is offering, such as the EMC benefits card for Mercedes-Benz owners in the emirate of Abu Dhabi, which provides exclusive special offers on a broad range of centers, stores, restaurants and recreational clubs; the 5 year extended warranty on all Mercedes-Benz models (2-year Manufacturer and 3-year EMC extended warranty), and the free Integrated Service Packages of five years (ISP) on the S and GL classes. \\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\\"All this adds to the fact that EMC has managed to open the biggest Mercedes-Benz facility in the world, to ensure quality customer service in the most comfortable environment,\\\" he said. \\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nFounded in 1962 by late Abdul Jalil Al Fahim, EMC enjoyed the vision of 3 generations of Al Fahim family over the decades to become one of the world\\u0027s most famous Mercedes-Benz distributors, embodying the success and excellence that both Mercedes-Benz and Al Fahim Group represent. The company was the first Mercedes-Benz distributor in the Middle East to be awarded ISO Certification in 1998 and is currently certified to the ISO 9001:2008 standards.\\r\\n\\u003c/div\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003cdiv\\u003e\\r\\nEMC announces a notable increase of 573% increase in sales of Mercedes-Benz CLS among females in the emirate of Abu Dhabi and a one week getaway in a Mercedes-Benz CLS for a bride-to-be \\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nAbu Dhabi, 8 February 2012:- Emirates Motor Company (EMC), Mercedes-Benz Authorized Distributor in Abu Dhabi and Al Ain and the flagship company of Al Fahim Group, celebrates the bridal season with the 2012 Abu Dhabi Bride Show as the Platinum Sponsor of the event offering a lucky bride-to-be a one week getaway in the all-new Mercedes-Benz CLS. \\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nDuring his speech at the press conference of the Bride Show, General Manager Mr. Kamal Rafih of EMC commented, \\\"EMC is proud to endorse this event as it brings together the lovely ladies of the Abu Dhabi community under one roof. As part of our corporate social responsibility initiatives and in line with the Mercedes-Benz tradition, we happily support activities related to fashion and help make a statement on the significant role women play in our society.\\\" \\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nMr. Rafih further commented that EMC\\u0027s training instructor, Mr. Marlon Robel, will be conducting basic vehicle safety training exclusively for ladies. \\\"It is vital for every woman to be aware of how her car works, how she can minimize risks while driving and how to react during an emergency.\\\" \\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nAt the Bride Show event beginning this week on 8 February 2012, EMC will be displaying the stunning Mercedes-Benz CLS at their stand along with the brand\\u0027s premium set of accessories. \\\"We have noticed a surge in our CLS sales where a highly notable 573% increase was discovered in 2011 compared to the old model in 2010 in our female segment along. This positions the CLS as one of the top three most popular Mercedes-Benz classes among ladies,\\\" Mr. Rafih continued. \\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nTo further strengthen EMC\\u0027s relationship with its public, the Mercedes-Benz dealership will be granting a one week getaway in a CLS to a lucky bride-to-be. \\\"A wedding is an important event for a bride and we wish to be part of this memorable day by making her feel even more special.\\\" Another raffle will be taking place during the show where EMC will also be giving a weekend test drive of the CLS and an elegant Mercedes-Benz watch to a lucky visitor of the show.\\r\\n\\u003c/div\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/td\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/tr\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/table\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/div\\u003e\\r\\n
