\\u003cdiv\\u003e\\r\\nAbu Dhabi:- Emirates Motor Company (EMC), Mercedes-Benz general distributor in Abu Dhabi and Al Ain and the flagship company of Al Fahim Group, Commercial Vehicle Division have announced a 40% year on year increase in van sales when comparing to 2010. \\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\\"Our van range has expanded significantly and we have a wide portfolio of products to suit many different requirements. Safety, reliability and image are first class which goes hand-in-hand with the Mercedes-Benz marquee; features such as ABS, airbags, automatic transmission, and advanced safety systems are standard on the majority of Mercedes-Benz van range,\\\" commented Mr. Kamal Rafih, General Manager of EMC. \\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nThe flagship model for 2011 was the Viano, with interior improvements including upgraded cockpit controls with four-spoke steering wheel as well as exterior enhancements, gave it an all-new look. The Viano is a leader in its class with the capability of carrying up to 7 passengers in a variety of comfortable seating arrangements making it a perfect choice for both family and corporate customers. \\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\\"From hotel shuttles and limousines, to taxis and ambulances, our van range satisfy any business demand. Additionally, the vehicles can be further personalised to cater to operators\\u0027 specific needs with options such as 4x4 conversions, mobile workshop installations and disability customization, which have proven to be popular. \\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\\"We are excited about 2012 where we aim to further increase our model range with the Vito panel van and Sprinter minibus to complement our product portfolio,\\\" added Mr. Daniel Fitzjohn, General Commercial Vehicle Manager, EMC.\\r\\n\\u003c/div\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/td\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/tr\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003cdiv\\u003e\\r\\nSpecial F1 GP guests Michael Schumacher & Nico Rosberg in the build-up to Abu Dhabi race \\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nAbu Dhabi, 10 November 2011:- Emirates Motor Company (EMC), Mercedes-Benz general distributor in Abu Dhabi and Al Ain and the flagship company of Al Fahim Group, proudly announces the official opening of the reborn and historic Airport Road Showroom. \\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nThe ribbon-cutting ceremony was held prior to the press conference of the Mercedes GP PETRONAS Formula One (F1) drivers Mr. Michael Schumacher and Mr. Nico Rosberg in the run-up to the Formula 1 Etihad Airways Abu Dhabi Grand Prix F1 GP. Mr. Rashed Abdul Jalil Al Fahim, Managing Director of Al Fahim Group, welcomed guests of honour Mr. Norbet Haug, President of Mercedes-Benz Motorsport Activity, Mr. Ross Brawn, F1 Team Principal and Motorsport Engineer, Mr. Ola Kaellenius, CEO of Mercedes-Benz AMG, Mr. Helmut Groesser, Head of Sales for Mercedes-Benz AMG, Mr. Mike Belk, CEO & President of Daimler Middle East & Levant (DMEL), Mr. Frank Bernthaler, Director of Sales & Marketing for Mercedes-Benz Cars DMEL, Ms. Katja Heim, CEO, KHP Consulting and Mr. Saeed Al Mehairi, top UAE GT driver, as well as EMC Mercedes-Benz customers from Abu Dhabi and Al Ain. \\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nPopular for the rotating Mercedes-Benz star on Airport Road, EMC returns to one of the first showrooms in the country, and celebrates the rebirth of EMC\\u0027s Airport Road Showroom. \\\"We have witnessed the growth of this showroom from 1964 positioning us into becoming one of the most recognized locations and brands in the emirate,\\\" reminisced Mr. Al Fahim. \\\"Today, we are delighted to be sharing this memorable milestone with the Formula One Mercedes GP Team, Mr. Schumacher and Mr. Nico; and, I would like to thank our partners from Daimler AG and DMEL for joining us in this special day.\\\" \\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nStunning mid-air acrobatic aerial displays formed the Mercedes-Benz star adding art and originality to the high-profile event which also featured, classical tunes played by a talented harpist and a caricaturist who entertained guests by quick-drawing their expressions. EMC customers had the opportunity to meet the F1 drivers at and were also treated to a special art exhibition by Emirati artist Khalid Ahli. \\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\\"We are thrilled to have Mercedes GP F1 drivers Michael Schumacher and Nico Rosberg here today on this special occasion. I wish the team all the best in the upcoming Abu Dhabi F1 Grand Prix,\\\" said Mr. Chris Preston, CEO of Al Fahim Group\\u0027s Automotive Division. \\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nMercedes is currently in fourth position in the Constructor\\u0027s Championship, with a total of 145 points after the October Indian GP. Seven-time World Champion Michael Schumacher finished fifth earning 10 points for the Mercedes team, while driver Nico Rosberg finished sixth, earning eight points. The team is looking forward to the forthcoming Abu Dhabi Grand Prix, which is the home of Mercedes F1 co-owners and partners Aabar Investments. \\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nEMC hosts this annual F1 Drivers\\u0027 Appearance event to induce the spirit of motorsports activities and encourage emerging talents to follow their dreams and aspirations. General Manager of EMC, Mr. Kamal Rafih, added, \\\"EMC is dedicated to inspiring gifted individuals among the local community and we\\u0027re delighted that one of the region\\u0027s top race car drivers is sharing this occasion with our partners, customers and employees. Mr. Al Mehairi\\u0027s presence is an important motivation for talented performance drivers to pursue their dreams, especially during Abu Dhabi\\u0027s F1 season. \\\" \\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nA special display of Mercedes-Benz classic cars, privately owned by the company\\u0027s Honorary Chairman, His Excellency Mohammed Abdul Jalil Al Fahim, was showcased at the event. Along with other classic models of the 1950s and 1960s such as the legendary SL 90, were among the displayed models.\\r\\n\\u003c/div\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/td\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/tr\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003ctr\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003ctd\\u003e \\r\\n \\u003cdiv class=\\\"Content\\\" valign=\\\"top\\\"\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003ctable border=\\\"0\\\" cellpadding=\\\"0\\\" cellspacing=\\\"0\\\" width=\\\"100%\\\"\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003ctr\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003ctd class=\\\"ContentText\\\" align=\\\"left\\\"\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003cdiv\\u003e\\r\\nAbu Dhabi, 30 October 2011: Emirates Motor Company (EMC), Mercedes-Benz authorized General Distributor in Abu Dhabi and Al Ain and flagship company of Al Fahim Group joins Abu Dhabi\\u0027s Formula One (F1) activities with the launch of an F1-themed Mercedes-Benz Service Week officially opened by His Excellency Saeed Abdul Jalil Al Fahim, Chairman of Al Fahim Group, in the presence of high officials and dignitaries including; the newly appointed German Ambassador, His Excellency Nikolai von Schoepff, Mr. Ivo Kapitzki, Vice President & Director of After Sales of Daimler Middle East & Levant (DMEL) and Emirati racecar driver celebrity, Mr. Saeed Al Mehairi. \\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\\"We are honored to welcome such renowned dignitaries and are pleased to have their support during the Mercedes-Benz Service Week which we have themed around the F1 event,\\\" praised Mr. Kamal Rafih, General Manager of EMC. \\\"EMC is dedicated to inspiring emerging talents among the local community and we\\u0027re delighted that one of the region\\u0027s top race car drivers is sharing this occasion with our partners, customers and employees. Mr. Al Mehairi\\u0027s presence is an important motivation for talented performance drivers to pursue their dreams, especially during Abu Dhabi\\u0027s F1 season. \\\" \\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nAs the core element of the Regional Mercedes-Benz Service Week is \\\"Safety\\\" which also plays a key role in today\\u0027s Motorsport, the presence of Saeed Al Mehairi is very much appreciated. \\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nDuring the event Mr. Al Mehairi commented, \\\"I am very excited to be part of this plan. People from my generation need an inspiration to follow and learn from. \\\"Safety\\\" is the most important element in the motorsport and during our normal day to day time. For us to build an awareness to young drivers requires a lot of work but that\\u0027s why I\\u0027m glad to be part of this so I can be able to pass on my knowledge on how we can have fun driving on the track but at the same time to be safe.\\\" \\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nBorn in 1987, Mr. Al Mehairi is the first and youngest Emirati racing instructor at the Yas Marina Circuit. Currently, he holds a International Automobile Federation (FIA) International Circuit B 2011 Racing License. Mr. Al Mehairi was chosen out of more than 700 Emirati racing drivers to represent the United Arab Emirates (UAE) in Europe positioning him as an inspiration to many talented young Emiratis who yearn to become internationally recognized official race drivers. \\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nEMC\\u0027s overall business strategy focuses on customers and prospects in order to ensure their experience with the dealership is not only satisfactory, but exceeds all their expectations. During the Mercedes-Benz Service Week this year, customers will enjoy a wide range of value-added services, special discounts, great prizes and other surprises. \\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nMoreover, EMC is also strong supporter of road safety and has invited two \\\"Flying Engineers\\\", Mr. Gerhard Waclaw and Mr. Brian Tietge from Daimler Germany to cater to customers\\u0027 queries and vehicle check-ups. As a privileged Mercedes-Benz owner, customers will receive a complimentary vehicle safety check, consultations with Mercedes-Benz experts, and discounts on labor, genuine spare parts, lifestyle collection and accessories - especially the F1 collection available at the EMC Boutique. \\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nMr. Thomas May, General After Sales Manager of EMC\\u0027s Passenger Cars, added, \\\"We have an air-conditioned reception with 18 active reception points where our customers meet one of our certified Mercedes-Benz service advisors to discuss and agree on the service and maintenance requirements of the vehicle. For the Service Week we have created a exhibition character and prepared a lot of activities and surprises for Mercedes-Benz owners.\\\" \\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\\"Starting from 29 October 2011 to 10 November 2011, all Mercedes-Benz owners of Abu Dhabi and Al Ain are invited and may take advantage of our partners\\u0027 attractive offers. We have also arranged for the first Vehicle Basics Training for Ladies to further emphasize our responsibility towards promoting road safety. We are offering 2 sessions in Abu Dhabi and 1 in Al Ain in order to familiarize ladies with basic vehicle technology and simple ways to help themselves - especially in emergency situations. The training will also give them more confidence in regards to service requirements of their vehicles.\\\" \\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nPartners who are participating in EMC\\u0027s Service Week are giving great discounts. Some of the brands which will be present throughout the Service Week are Mobil 1, Michelin, V-Kool, Prodent, Continental, Foil-A-Car, Samsung, Fairmont Bab Al Bahr, Cathay Pacific, Nasair and Safar Travel & Tourism. \\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nPrizes in different categories and raffles during the Service Week will include: Tickets for the 2011 Eithad F1 Grand Prix at Yas Marina Circuit, a weekend stay at the luxurious Fairmont Bab Al Bahr Hotel, a Business Class return ticket to Hong Kong via Cathay Pacific Airways, weekend test drive with the thrilling new Mercedes-Benz SLK and lots more. \\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nTo guarantee customers of the Service Week receive the best hospitality while their cars are being serviced, a special area has been setup for that. Customer will also have entry to the business lounge and PitStop Café and are welcome to ask for a facility tour - EMC in Abu Dhabi is still known as the largest Mercedes-Benz facility in the world. Nevertheless with very personalized and attractively prized services. \\\"The Service Week initiative by EMC is important to help Mercedes-Benz owners genuinely take care of their cars for their own safety, while also learn more about race car driving and the growing love for motorsports in this region,\\\" Mr. Rafih stated in his closing remarks. Emirates Motor Company has also participated in Abu Dhabi\\u0027s exciting Yasalam activities on the Corniche by displaying the stunning 2012 Mercedes-Benz CLS and C-Coupe along with the recently launched sporty Mercedes-Benz SLK.\\r\\n\\u003c/div\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/td\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/tr\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/table\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/div\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/td\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003ePopular for the rotating Mercedes-Benz star on Airport Road, Emirates Motor Company (EMC), Mercedes-Benz general distributors in Abu Dhabi and Al Ain, returns to one of the first showrooms in the country, and celebrates the rebirth of EMC\\u0027s Airport Road Showroom. \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003e\\\"Many of our employees have witnessed the growth of EMC, which started as a small showroom on Corniche Road in the early 1960s, and moved in 1964 to Airport Road, a visionary decision by the late founder, Abdul Jalil Al Fahim (mercy upon him), positioning us into becoming one of the most recognized locations and brands in the Emirate,\\\" recalled Mr. Kamal Rafih, General Manager of EMC. \\\"Today, we are living the rebirth of the famous EMC Airport Road Showroom.\\\" \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003eWith the start of a holy and blessed month, EMC commences a new journey and opens the new showroom with great Ramadan offers on the latest Mercedes-Benz cars. Beginning with low profit rates and monthly installments starting in 2012, the EMC Airport Road Showroom is open to visitors from 9:00 am to 15:00 pm and 9:00 pm to 12:00 am. Ramadan offer is available in all EMC showrooms and includes:\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cul\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003cli\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003eFinance Plus solutions exclusive to EMC\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/li\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003cli\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003e2.75% profit rate up to 5 years and no monthly installments until 2012\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/li\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003cli\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003e13 months comprehensive insurance\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/li\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003cli\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003e5-year warranty (2-year manufacturer, 3-year EMC extended warranty)\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/li\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003cli\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003eTrade-in facility\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/li\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003c/ul\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003eMoreover, as part of the opening activities, EMC has invited Emirati Artist, Mr. Khaled Ahli, to display his paintings at the new showroom marking this memorable occasion. EMC has always been passionate about empowering people and is, in particular, a keen supporter of art. In line with the country\\u0027s artistic growth, Mr. Ahli\\u0027s poignant paintings range from colorful abstract designs to traditional shots which portray the UAE\\u0027s deep Arabic heritage. In the following days, Mr. Ahli\\u0027s paintings will be on exhibit across other EMC showrooms in Mussafah, Marina Mall and Eastern Motors-Al Ain.\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003cdiv\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cspan\\u003eAiming to continually provide value added benefits to Mercedes-Benz customers, EMC has joined forces with Abu Dhabi Country Club (ADCC) signing a joint alliance agreement. \\\"We are pleased to have formed this alliance with ADCC as it brings a wealth of benefits to our owners in Abu Dhabi,\\\" commended Mr. Kamal Rafih, General Manager of EMC. \\\"Confirming our strategic plan of active customer relationship management and targeting a new profile of customers, this venture also provides benefits to ADCC club members.\\\" Targeting over 3,200 ADCC active members, the agreement involves test drive events in Mercedes-Benz vehicles, on top of discounts and special rates to ADCC\\u0027s members who are Mercedes-Benz customers. Later in the year, club visitors will also get to explore the newest and most desirable Mercedes-Benz alternating in displaying a collection of luxurious, sporty and adventurous rides throughout the year. As part of the agreement, EMC benefits cardholders will receive a 15% discount at Sardinia restaurant and a 20% discount on the extraordinary Space Walk activity, also known as the zero-gravity experience. Meanwhile, Abu Dhabi resident club members owning a Mercedes-Benz will be given a 45% discount on accessories, 25% on spare parts, 15% on labor (excluding fixed service packages) and a free safety check. In his closing remarks, Mr. Rafih emphasized, \\\"Customer relationship management is one of EMC\\u0027s core strategic objectives, which is also in accordance to ADCC\\u0027s business goals. Consequently, this has enabled us to grant discounted rates and special activities to club members and vehicles owners.\\\"\\r\\n\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/div\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/td\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003eEmirates Motor Company (EMC), Mercedes-Benz general distributors in Abu Dhabi and Al Ain and the flagship company of Al Fahim Group, has delivered 124 Mercedes-Benz vehicles to limousine and rental company German Rent a Car\\u0027s fleet of luxury cars.\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\\"We have witnessed an increased demand for Mercedes-Benz vehicles in the region and we are happy to partner with German Rent a Car to fulfill their mission to deliver their clientele with the utmost in luxury and safety,\\\" commented Mr. Irfan Tansel, General Manager of EMC. \\\"Our vehicles offer unparalleled elegance, an outstanding driving performance as well as state-of-the-art technology.\\\"\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nGerman Rent a Car\\u0027s investment includes a range of Mercedes-Benz models ranging from the famous C-Class to the legendary new E-Class collection, and a prominent array of S-Classes to their top notch customers in Abu Dhabi. For their most VIP clients, EMC has also delivered the daring Mercedes-Benz G55s to cater to sports utility and high performance car enthusiasts.\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003e\\\"Emirates Motor Company and German Rent a Car have developed a close relationship over the last three years with hundreds of Mercedes-Benz top range vehicles have been brought by the high profile rental company for their VIP clients in the capital,\\\" concluded Mr. Irfan. \\\"We are delighted our partnership has remained strong.\\\"\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\\"One of the cornerstones of our success has been our ability to build a partnership with EMC. Our business will continue to provide the same high quality vehicles and services. GRAC takes this opportunity to thank EMC for the courtesies shown in the past years and hopes it will continue to serve our business in a way that is mutually beneficial and profitable to our company,\\\" stated Mr. Tarek Abo Abdu, General Manager German Rent a Car.\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nHousing the world\\u0027s largest Mercedes-Benz facility with the most advanced technology and highly skilled labor force, EMC is one of the leading distributors of Mercedes-Benz vehicles in the region. As German Rent a Car is also one of the principal luxury car leasing agencies in the UAE, EMC is pleased to partner with a recognized company that also values its customers and aims to deliver quality vehicles and a rewarding rental experience.\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/td\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/tr\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/table\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/div\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003cul\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003cli\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003eEMC launches Daimler Approved pre-owned car program and dedicated website:\\u003ca href=\\\"http://www.emcusedcars.ae/\\\"\\u003ewww.emcusedcars.ae\\u003c/a\\u003e.\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/li\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003cli\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003eUsed car customer-base change in demographics from 2008 to 2010: Arab expatriates increase 50%, Asian expatriates increase 71% and Western expatriates increase 41%. Emirati customers still remains the majority.\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/li\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003cli\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003eYoung adults in Abu Dhabi and Al Ain penetrate Mercedes-Benz\\u0027s pre-owned and approved car market.\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/li\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003c/ul\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003eEmirates Motor Company (EMC), the official distributor for Mercedes-Benz in Abu Dhabi and Al Ain and the flagship company of Al Fahim Group, launches Proven Exclusivity, a Daimler AG-approved pre-owned car program, and announces a 50% rise in the pre-owned Mercedes-Benz expatriate population in the capital.\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nIn an effort to keep up with changes in consumer behavior, especially among residents in Abu Dhabi and Al Ain, EMC has announced a Daimler AG approved pre-owned car program called Proven Exclusivity where only cars less than five years old and have been driven less than 100,000 kilometers are included. Details of the program can be found in EMC\\u0027s recently launched pre-owned cars website:\\u003ca href=\\\"http://www.emcusedcars.ae/\\\"\\u003ewww.emcusedcars.ae\\u003c/a\\u003e.\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\\"This program ensures peace of mind for our customers who will get the opportunity to buy a manufacturer-backed vehicle that has undergone a complete multipoint check and comes with a 12-month extended warranty,\\\" said Mr. Irfan Tansel, The General Manager of EMC. \\\"Proven Exclusivity will also give new car buyers confidence allowing them to buy-in the knowledge that their car will retain its value during their ownership.\\\"\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nAmong car manufacturers in the Abu Dhabi market, Mercedes-Benz has the highest resale value ranging between 5% and 25% higher than its luxury brand competitors of the same origin. The brand\\u0027s known for its exceptional safety features, durable engine, sophisticated technology and quality materials making it a leader among the Abu Dhabi and Al Ain cities this year.\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003e\\\"We have also examined our pre-owned database of customers where an exponential increase in the expatriate population in the last couple of years has been noticed,\\\" he continued. \\\"While the Emirati segment still remains the majority, the Arab expat community has grown by 50%, Asians by 71% and Westerners by 41%.\\\"\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nThe change in demographics is in line with the capital\\u0027s economic transformations which illustrated a larger expatriate community flowing into the capital from neighboring emirates and abroad. While Arabic customers with used Mercedes-Benz cars mostly multiplied in 2009, the Asian and Western owners in Abu Dhabi and Al Ain only augmented in 2010.\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\\"Another interesting statistic is the dramatic increase among young adults under the age of 34 who now comprise the largest populace of pre-owned Mercedes-Benz owners in the capital,\\\" he added. In contrast, in 2009, the largest group of used car customers in EMC was between 35 and 44.\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nConsidering customer demographics has helped EMC better understand its customer base, and on a larger scale, the luxury market as a whole. As a result, with the launch of EMC\\u0027s approved used car program and website, as well as the recently launched EMC benefits card, the dealership has also introduced a customer satisfaction index for customers to voice their opinions on their experience with the Pre-Owned Car Division at EMC.\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/td\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/tr\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/table\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/div\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/td\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/tr\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003eAbout EMC Card\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003eEmirates Motor Company (EMC) benefits program is designed to offer discounts and value added services to EMC customers holding EMC Card on a variety of products and services in the UAE. The card will allow EMC customers to avail of offers s from a growing list of service providers and retailers ranging from department stores to gifts, fashion, restaurants and healthcare providers etc…\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nThe aim of this program is to differentiate EMC community by creating a privileged treatment for the members and ensure that they get the recognition they deserve not only when dealing with EMC but also while shopping, dining or getting away. The card will also be the holder\\u0027s ID when interacting with any of EMC\\u0027s divisions and branches in Abu Dhabi and Al Ain to ensure they are recognized by our staff at all times.\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003eCard holders will receive continuous updates including new partners on board and additional special offers through SMS and email. Furthermore, Card holders can always check \\u003ca href=\\\"http://www.emccard.ae/\\\"\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003ewww.emccard.ae\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/a\\u003e to get the latest updates and offers.\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003eThe card has a yearly validity with the expiry date mentioned on the front of it. Renewing it is free of charge and very simple whether by filling the renewal application and attaching the latest vehicle registration or by contacting us through on +97126567766. Accordingly, the special offers extended by EMC partners are valid as long as the card is valid and under the terms and condition mentioned on every partner\\u0027s page.\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003eOur aim is to continue delivering the most superior services with a passion to exceed all expectations.\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cdiv style=\\\"direction: rtl;\\\"\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp dir=\\\"rtl\\\"\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003eÙ†Ø¨Ø°Ø© Ø­ÙˆÙ„ Ø§Ù„Ø¨Ø±Ù†Ø§Ù…Ø¬\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp dir=\\\"rtl\\\"\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003eØªÙ… ØªØµÙ…ÙŠÙ… Ø¨Ø±Ù†Ø§Ù…Ø¬ Ø´Ø±ÙƒØ© Ø§Ù„Ø¥Ù…Ø§Ø±Ø§Øª Ù„Ù„Ø³ÙŠØ§Ø±Ø§Øª Ù„ØªÙ…ÙŠØ² Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ù…Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ù„ØªÙ‚Ø¯ÙŠÙ… Ø®ØµÙˆÙ…Ø§Øª ÙˆØ®Ø¯Ù…Ø§Øª Ø°Ø§Øª Ù‚ÙŠÙ…Ø© Ù…Ø¶Ø§ÙØ© Ù„Ù„Ø¹Ù…Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø­Ø§Ù…Ù„ÙŠ Ø§Ù„Ø¨Ø·Ø§Ù‚Ø© Ø¹Ù„Ù‰ Ù…Ø¬Ù…ÙˆØ¹Ø© Ù…ØªÙ†ÙˆØ¹Ø© Ù…Ù† Ø§Ù„Ù…Ù†ØªØ¬Ø§Øª ÙˆØ§Ù„Ø®Ø¯Ù…Ø§Øª ÙÙŠ Ø¯ÙˆÙ„Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø¥Ù…Ø§Ø±Ø§Øª Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ø±Ø¨ÙŠØ© Ø§Ù„Ù…ØªØ­Ø¯Ø© ÙˆØ§Ù„ØªÙŠ ØªÙ†ÙˆØ¹Øª Ù„ØªØ´Ù…Ù„ ØªØ´ÙƒÙŠÙ„Ø© ÙˆØ§Ø³Ø¹Ø© Ù…Ù† Ù…ØªØ§Ø¬Ø± Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø²ÙŠØ§Ø¡ØŒ Ù…Ø±Ø§ÙƒØ²Ø§Ù„Ø±Ø¹Ø§ÙŠØ© Ø§Ù„ØµØ­ÙŠØ©ØŒ Ø§Ù„Ù…ÙƒØªØ¨Ø§ØªØŒ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø·Ø§Ø¹Ù… ÙˆØ§Ù„Ù†ÙˆØ§Ø¯ÙŠ ÙˆØºÙŠØ±Ù‡Ø§...\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nÙˆØ§Ù„Ù‡Ø¯Ù Ù‡Ùˆ Ø¶Ù…Ø§Ù† Ø­ØµÙˆÙ„ Ø£Ø¹Ø¶Ø§Ø¡ Ø§Ù„Ø¨Ø±Ù†Ø§Ù…Ø¬ Ø¹Ù„Ù‰ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø¹Ø§Ù…Ù„Ø© Ø§Ù„Ù…Ù…ÙŠØ²Ø© Ø§Ù„ØªÙŠ ÙŠØ³ØªØ­Ù‚ÙˆÙ†Ù‡Ø§ ØŒ Ù„ÙŠØ³ ÙÙ‚Ø· Ø¹Ù†Ø¯ Ø§Ù„ØªØ¹Ø§Ù…Ù„ Ù…Ø¹ Ø´Ø±ÙƒØ© Ø§Ù„Ø¥Ù…Ø§Ø±Ø§Øª Ù„Ù„Ø³ÙŠØ§Ø±Ø§Øª ØŒ Ø¨Ù„ Ø£ÙŠØ¶Ø§ Ø£Ø«Ù†Ø§Ø¡ Ø§Ù„ØªØ³ÙˆÙ‚ Ùˆ ÙÙŠ ÙƒØ§ÙØ© Ø§Ù„Ø§ÙˆÙ‚Ø§Øª. \\u003cul\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003cli\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003eEMC and Schumacher present special needs children with F1 race tickets\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/li\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003cli\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003eEMC launches Mercedes-Benz iPhone/iPad Application for customers\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/li\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003cli\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003eEMC receives CIO 20 Award for the new iPhone/iPad application \\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/li\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003c/ul\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cdiv\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cspan\\u003e\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nEmirates Motor Company (EMC), Mercedes-Benz general distributors in Abu Dhabi and Al Ain and the flagship company of Al Fahim Group, welcomed seven-time Formula One (F1) World Champion Michael Schumacher in an entertaining evening to meet EMC customers and children of the Special Care Center (SCC) Abu Dhabi at the Fairmont Bab Al Bahr.\\r\\n\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/div\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cdiv\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003e\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\\"We are honored to welcome Michael Schumacher and would like to take this one-time opportunity to thank him for visiting us, our valuable customers and our children at SCC,\\\" praised Mr. Irfan Tansel, General Manager of EMC. To celebrate Michael Schumacher\\u0027s first race participation at the Grand Prix of Abu Dhabi, the high caliber event brought together a galaxy of VIPs and EMC customers.\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nAs an ambassador for UNESCO and a spokesperson on driver safety for the FIA, Michael Schumacher talked to EMC\\u0027s Mercedes-Benz owners and guests on the importance of driving safely and responsibly. Moreover, Michael Schumacher and EMC demonstrated their compassionate sides by handing out Abu Dhabi Grand Prix F1 race tickets to the special needs children attending the occasion.\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\\"On behalf of the children and the Special Care Centre team, I would like to thank EMC for its kind generosity and continuous support,\\\" thanked Ms. Nisha Thomas, Head of Education and Training at SCC. \\\"The opportunity to meet an icon in the F1 arena and celebrate with the rest of Abu Dhabi the long-awaited F1 season is not only a gift to the students but an opportunity for community awareness and integration.\\\"\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nThe event also witnessed EMC\\u0027s launch of its CIO award-winning iPhone/iPad application for the Abu Dhabi and Al Ain markets making it the first Mercedes-Benz authorized distributor in the Gulf region to introduce an iPhone/iPad application. Allowing customers to track the service progress of their vehicle, customers may also arrange for a service appointment at anytime. In addition, Mercedes-Benz fans may also book a vehicle test drive or check out the latest arrivals of new and pre-owned models by simply \\u0027touching\\u0027 their screens.\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\\"This evening\\u0027s event is to also officially announce our EMC application which has been recognized by CIO 20 Middle East Awards 2010 for our pioneering customer-focused solution where we have used information technology in innovative ways to deliver business value,\\\" stated Mr. Irfan in his closing remarks.\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003cbr /\\u003e\\r\\nThis event is in line with the dealership\\u0027s mission to deliver superior services with a passion to exceed all expectations.\\u003c/span\\u003e\\u003c/p\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003c/div\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/td\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/tr\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/table\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/div\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/td\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/tr\\u003e\\r\\n \\u003c/table\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003c/body\\u003e\\r\\n\\u003c/html\\u003e\\r\\n\",\"IsBinaryUnique\":true}}]
